923250.name: Nekomew's Potty Trouble OST
923250.description:
Do you want to continue supporting Nekomew? Now you can get the full Nekomew's Potty Trouble soundtrack!

  • After you (0:33)
  • Concern (2:13)
  • Encourage me, doll! (1:13)
  • Extra walk down the hall (special track) (4:11)
  • Happy Birthday (discarded) (0:19)
  • Happy Birthday (0:22)
  • Hidden in the night's darkness (0:36)
  • Main menu (1:58)
  • Night walk down the hall (2:02)
  • Our new beginning (2:01)
  • The last challenge (4:17)
  • Today is the day (0:50)
  • You're ready for this! (0:39)

Files are in .mp3 format.

Once you get it, go to the installation folder of the game (in the NekomewsPottyTroubleOST folder) to enjoy the music! :3
923250.supported_languages:
英语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
